name: Luz (DrCocktorPHD)
description:
Have you ever wanted to play a retro space shooter that involves killing Osama Bin Laden, Kim Jong Un, tons of aliens, and tons of strange spaceships, all while being bombarded by a brutal difficulty level, a 2-player co-op mode, and a pounding 8-bit soundtrack? Regardless, it's free, so give it a shot.

Controls are a bit wonky:

P1 Controls:

AWSD - move

J - primary gun

k - secondary gun

R - slow down

T - speed up

P2 Controls:

1523 (on num pad) - move

left click - primary gun

right click - secondary gun

speed change is not yet implemented for co-op.

Powerups, Enemies, Bosses, etc.

Powerups come in red or blue capsules with letters on them. Anything else is harmful to the player. Powerups can be created by killing enemies. What they do is for the player to figure out. That's part of the fun of retro games.
